title: Tailored Resume
answer: Tailor your resume to the job: mirror the key skills, quantify impact, and keep it concise (1 page for juniors).
steps: Read the JD; highlight top 5 skills.

title: STAR Interviews
answer: Use STAR: Situation, Task, Action, Result. Prepare 6–8 stories covering conflict, leadership, failure, and impact.
steps: Practice aloud and time your answers.

title: Networking that Helps
answer: Offer value: share insights, code, or small contributions. Build relationships before asking for referrals.
steps: Share one useful post or mini-project.

title: Projects Portfolio
answer: Show, don’t just tell. Build 2–3 solid projects with readme, demo, and tests. Recruiters love clear impact.
steps: Pick problems tied to real users.
Ship MVPs; write clean READMEs with screenshots.
Pin your best repos on GitHub.

title: General
answer: Clarify your target role, tailor your narrative, and show evidence through projects and stories.
